Uses of Package
com.opengamma.strata.product.bond

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.product.bond 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond
    Calculators for bonds.
    com.opengamma.strata.product.bond
    Entity objects describing bonds.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.product.bond used by com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond 
    Class and Description
    BondFuture

    A futures option contract, based on bonds.

    BondFutureTrade
    A trade representing a futures contract based on a fixed coupon bond.
    FixedCouponBond
    A fixed coupon bond.
    FixedCouponBondTrade
    A trade representing a fixed coupon bond.
